```{r}
1.
t.test(bwt~smoke, mu=0, alternative='two.sided', data=birthwt)
p-value = 0.007 so reject null because 0.0007 < 0.1 is not 95 percent

birthwt %>%
  mutate(smoke = as.factor(smoke)) %.%
  ggplot(aes(x = smoke, y = bwt)) + 
  geom_boxplot()
